attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app is honestly just so poorly designed. I got this app to keep in touch with what the president is up to and just ... wow. This is the worst app I have ever come across in my entire life.

attributes.title: spray tanned god
attributes.review: in hopes to open my vision to something greater i went to support the large man who wears a toupee by downloading this app. instead i found that after i opened the app my home and lock screen had been changed to unsolicited pictures of donald himself, maybe its a glitch or something like that but my mother is very distrubed. therefore i am leaving a one star review.

attributes.title: Disgusting.
attributes.review: The app was terrible, i didn’t receive all of the items that i ordered. The shipping also took about two months.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS ITS GARBAGE
attributes.review: What even is the really like it has no point no one likes that Cheeto like I just wish Obama came BackBecause that Cheeto isn’t doing anything good for us he doesn’t even wear a mask outside and the thing is that’s so immature

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I tried to download the app but it took about an hour even though I HAD GREAT WiFi Then I couldn’t even open it so I don’t know what’s going on but I can’t do anything with the app

attributes.title: This app is the WORST💅🏻✨🙂
attributes.review: This app is absolutely TERRIBLE!!! It started playing porn and woke my baby up😠 it made my phone completely brake and when I got it fixed they said that inside of my system was trump merch🤢 PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! 💅🏻✨

attributes.title: Not so good
attributes.review: This app made me lose my cell phone and come back from the dead like literally was not good and cause a shock in my phone for downloading it, it’s not good nor should it be public.

attributes.title: Fascist
attributes.review: I went threw the app to see if I should even consider voting for trump. All I’ve learned is he’s not who people think he is and this app should not be on the App Store for a man that believes such stupid things
